sealPopupP1: To obtain a Gamecheck seal badge of approval for your website, the following conditions must be met:
sealPopupP2: 1. All game providers must approve the use of authentic games.
sealPopupP3: 2. A fully approved gaming license is required. Please contact us to initiate the verification process.
metaDescription: {{name}} is now featured on Gamecheck. Discover how Gamecheck helps protect players by verifying authenticity and exposing counterfeit risks in iGaming.
somethingWrongNote: Should you encounter any inaccuracies or omissions, please <0> contact us </0> immediately for prompt resolution. Your input is crucial for maintaining accuracy.
notVerifiedNote: We are currently verifying the authenticity of the games provided by this vendor. At this time, we cannot confirm whether the games are authentic or counterfeit.
disclaimer: Disclaimer: The information provided regarding licenses is sourced directly from the gaming website we are reporting on. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee the information is always up-to-date or complete. For the most accurate and current licensing details, please refer directly to the official website or consult a legal professional.
siteStatusPending: Initial or further checks are pending.
authenticCheckedStatus: A selection of games from multiple game providers have been checked and no counterfeit games have been found.
counterfeitCheckedStatus: A selection of games from multiple game providers has been checked, and counterfeit games have been found.
